attributes.action: Issue British passports now and exchange those with EU logos  for small fee.
attributes.background: Holding a passport with an EU logo passport for 10 years or more after we voted out of the EU is unacceptable to the majority. A passport renewed in the next 12 months means that the holder will be carrying around a passport with an EU logo for some 12 years after the Brexit vote on 23 June 2016.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "issue British passports". British passports are currently being issued. 

You could start a petition calling on the Government to give people the option to exchange a passport with an EU logo for one without an EU logo, for a small fee, as soon as the UK leaves the EU.
